product_name: Milkman Instant Low-Fat Dry Powdered Milk - 1 Quart
long_description: Milkman Instant Low-Fat dry milk has just a touch of cream added for delicious taste. It makes any meal complete on the trail or at home. Pour the contents into 0.5 qt. of water, stirring constantly with a fork or spoon; add water to make 1 qt., then chill and serve. Milkman Instant Low-Fat dry milk contains only 0.5% milk fat when mixed with 1 qt. of water. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Milkman Instant Low-Fat dry milk has just a touch of cream added for delicious taste. It makes any meal complete on the trail or at home.
